last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the case's loose ends tie up, the question becomes whether the law can truly serve justice. Sol A, Sol B and Joon-hwi prepare for a competition.

name: Law School
overview: Following the case of the murder of a professor at South Korea's top prestigious law school, professors and students become suspects in the murder.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When a grim incident occurs at their prestigious school, justice through law is put to a test by a tough law professor and his ambitious students.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: During a mock trial at school, a student makes a shocking discovery. Yang Jong-hoon, a former prosecutor-turned-professor, examines the crime scene.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As evidence piles up against Jong-hoon, he's interrogated by the police. On an exam, Han Joon-hwi's past trouble with the school is used as a prompt.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: With Joon-hwi now a suspect in the murder case, authorities call for a second autopsy. A sudden attack places Jong-hoon's life in danger.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Back in the classroom, Jong-hoon poses his own ongoing case as an assignment topic. Facing charges from Jong-hoon, Prosecutor Jin Hyeong-u retaliates.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A student's plagiarism case seems tied to key evidence that could exonerate Jong-hoon. Kang Sol A sympathizes with a client at the legal clinic.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ahead of his first trial, Jong-hoon finds out Kang Sol B's secret. Joon-hwi watches over Sol A as she deals with her family's unsettling neighbor.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Sol A is stunned when Jong-hoon receives a call from someone she never expected. Back in court on the stand, Seo Ji-ho shares a tragic story.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Prosecutor Jin claims to have a witness who saw Jong-hoon commit the murder. A scared and threatened Jeon Ye-seul grapples with a difficult decision.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Ye-seul struggles to find a lawyer. Kim Eun-suk banks on one of her students to own up to his actions and provide the testimony Jong-hoon needs.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Joon-hwi tracks down important evidence, but it may still not be enough to acquit Jong-hoon. The students help Ye-seul build a case for self-defense.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: As the students get busy with training opportunities, Joon-hwi begins working under Prosecutor Jin. Jurors are selected for Ye-seul's trial.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: After an unexpected court appearance threatens to turn the tide of Ye-seul's trial, Jong-hoon uses classroom methods to help her speak her truth.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A new arrest is made for the murder of Seo Byung-ju, but Jong-hoon has unanswered questions. The jury reaches a verdict for Ye-seul.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Speculations arise about Lee Man-ho's motives. Jong-hoon and the students suspect Byung-ju wasn't alone in his car during the hit-and-run.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Sol A grapples with financial woes and Kang Dan's sudden appearance. Malicious comments flood the students' video of accusations against Ko Hyeong-su.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: As the case's loose ends tie up, the question becomes whether the law can truly serve justice. Sol A, Sol B and Joon-hwi prepare for a competition.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: When a grim incident occurs at their prestigious school, justice through law is put to a test by a tough law professor and his ambitious students.
